name: BloodBerry
description:
Have you ever thought of dropping out you job, and quitting this citylike lifestyle?

 In this game you will not get any of those, but instead you can farm this odd berrys called Bloodberrys for your king.

 Be aware of  time and be sure to have your tax  ready when your king demands it or suffer the consecuences... Enjoy clicking out this game.

Note: The game is a Clicker! So expect to click... a lot.

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
